summary: In order to make ends meet, three women steps out from their houses for earning. However, this irks their jobless husbands who can go to extreme lengths to stop them.
cast: Govinda|Juhi Chawla|Tabu|Chandrachur Singh|Johnny Lever|Vinay Anand|Isha Koppikar|Ketki Dave|Mink Singh|Shakti Kapoor|Asrani|Ranjeet|Sayaji Shinde|Tiku Talsania|Raju Srivastava|Viju Khote|Razak Khan|Sai Subhakar|Master Dilawar Abbas|Master Vamsi Krishna|Master Sandeep|Baby Sundeera|Baby Priyanka|Naushaad Abbas|Yusuf
director: Directors: K. Raghavendra Rao, A.S. Ravindra Babu (co-director)
title: Aamdani Atthanni Kharcha Rupaiya
